name: Unbelievable Accountant Party
description:
Christmas Eve 1988, an accountancy office party at the Sokitomi Plaza turns explosive as Terrorists take over the building. Only one man can stop them!

Pork Hardcheese... or is it Blast McRunfast... maybe it was Bacon Bigflank...

Fill the shoes of this 80s action hero, whatever his name is, in this retro action stealth adventure.

Save Hostages, Defuse Bombs, take out Terrorists. Leave behind no trace or stack up a large body count, it's your choice!

Download the Pico8 cart over on the Pico8 BBS

Tips and Tricks

  • Sprinting makes more noise than walking. Tapping move makes no noise at all.
  • If you have no weapons, you still have your fists! Lure enemies around corners and take them out with a punch before they can react
  • Enemies will turn to face sounds they hear, but wont leave their posts unless a lot of noise is made
  • Enemies will spot freed hostages and follow them to you
  • Watch for windows. You can be seen through them, shot through them, but you can also throw bottles and shoot through them yourself
